Health care facilities

Healthcare in Abu Dhabi is high quality, with both public and private hospitals offering premium healthcare, matching the standards of the USA, UK and other high-earning Western countries. English is commonly spoken and most of the medical staff are foreign doctors or foreign-trained. Private medical centres tend to be state-of-the-art and offer a range of inpatient and outpatient clinics. It is a legal requirement for all residents in Abu Dhabi to have private medical insurance and it is your employers responsibility to arranging a minimum level of cover.

View Useful Links
